pro.zackpollard.telegrambot.api.conversations

Interface ConversationRegistry

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Extension
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConversationRegistryImpl

    public interface ConversationRegistry
extends Extension
    A registry which holds conversations and manages the messages accordingly.
    Author:
    Mazen Kotb
    See Also:
    ConversationRegistryImpl

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface pro.zackpollard.telegrambot.api.extensions.Extension

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void registerConversation(Conversation conversation)
      Registers a conversation to be called
      void removeConversation(Conversation conversation)
      Removes a conversation from the registry, declared ending.

    • Method Detail

      • registerConversation

        void registerConversation(Conversation conversation)
        Registers a conversation to be called
        Parameters:
        conversation - conversation to be registered

      • removeConversation

        void removeConversation(Conversation conversation)
        Removes a conversation from the registry, declared ending. If conversation has not ended, calls end() method.
        Parameters:
        conversation - conversation to be registered.
        See Also:
        Conversation.end()
